price: Pagkatapos sasabihin sa kanila: “Ito ay ang dati ninyong pinasisinungalingan.”
arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
